# Heading 1

## Heading 2

### Heading 3

#### Heading 4

##### Heading 5

###### Heading 6

*Italic*

**Bold**

***Bold Italic***

1.  List item 1
2.  List item 2

-   bullet 1
-   bullet 2

Link: [My website](https://www.usmanafzali.com)


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
answer <- 2 + 4
answer
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] 6
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
my_data <- cars
my_data
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

To run each `line`, say for testing, use `command + return`.

# Including Plots


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
plot(my_data$speed ~ my_data$dist)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](quartoBasics_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-2-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


You can also embed plots, for example: Here, `echo=FALSE` means that the code will not be shown.


::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output-display}
![](quartoBasics_files/figure-html/pressure-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


Note that the `echo = FALSE` parameter was added to the code chunk to prevent printing of the R code that generated the plot.





# Viridis colours


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
image(volcano, col = viridis(200, option = "A"))
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](quartoBasics_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-4-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::
